description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,k)=t(n,2k), t given by A027960, 0<=k<=n, n >= 0.
comments: Right-edge columns are polynomials approximating Lucas(2n+1).
formula: T(n, k) = Lucas(2n+1) = A002878(n) for 2k<=n, otherwise the (2n-2k)th coefficient of the power series for (1+2x)/{(1-x-x^2)(1-x)^(2k-n)}.
crossrefs: This is a bisection of the "Lucas array" A027960, see A027011 for the other bisection.
Row sums are in A000918. Right-edge columns include A034856, A027966, A027968, A027970, A027972.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
